column2: Don’t hurt me, I’m not corrupted by that magic like they are.
Who are you?
My name is Catherine, I’m the whistleblower that tipped you off to this whole situation.
Do you know what happened to the last agent they sent to investigate?
Last agent?
I didn’t know they had already sent someone.
Hmm… That’s strange.
What can you tell me about what is going on here?
The company has been struggling for a while. The CEO brought in a string of contractors to try to solve it but nothing worked.
Eventually the head of accounting, the head of HR, and the CEO devised a plan.
They began trading in all kinds of illegal goods... guns, drugs, you name it.
Did they report those sales as taxable income?
No.
Then I can’t let this stand for one moment longer.
This floor is the IT department. Nobody on this floor was involved in the criminal behavior.
We’ll see about that. I have a warrant to search the whole building.
You won’t be able to talk to the head of IT unless you file a support ticket first. He’s very adamant about that.
2nd floor
The head of HR's office is right through this door. They put her office right next to the generator room because she likes to blast anime theme songs while she works.
They do tend to be bangers.
I have searched this floor and I didn’t find any evidence of the guns or drugs that you mentioned earlier.
Oh… umm…
That makes sense because it was mostly the head of accounting that was doing it, Carol was just helping to cover it up.
I’m sure you’ll find the evidence you’re looking for in her office.
I’m sure I will.
Good luck against Carol. I hear her sword is made of steel folded 10,000 times and can cut through other swords like butter.
I’m pretty sure that’s not how it works.
